pages.text: Hold [w] to Ponder. $(br2)The Hose Pulley is what you would use to extract a large body of fluid like water from a lake or lava from the lava oceans of the Nether. Just make sure it goes all the way to the bottom.

$(li)It is recommended to use an array of Mechanical Pumps in order to rapidly extract fluid from a body of water or lava. $(li)Any body of fluid that has a volume of 10,000 blocks is considered infinite.
